data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Tropical Storm Franklin formed on August 12. It ____ not ____ landfall. Bermuda ____ able ____ get ____ rain ____ from ____ storm ____ it ____ close ____. The storm began to dissipate after it had left Bermuda.
data.partBlankContent: Tropical Storm Franklin formed on August 12. It d__ not ma__ landfall. Bermuda w__ able t_ get so__ rain ba___ from t__ storm wh__ it mo___ close b_. The storm began to dissipate after it had left Bermuda.
data.fullContent: Tropical Storm Franklin formed on August 12. It did not make landfall. Bermuda was able to get some rain bands from the storm when it moved close by. The storm began to dissipate after it had left Bermuda.
data.answer: 热带风暴“富兰克林”形成于8月12日。它并没有登陆。当风暴靠近百慕大时，在那里形成了一些雨带。风暴离开百慕大群岛后开始消散。
